title: "He's The Nicest": Donald Trump's High Praise For PM Modi
content: Before Narendra Modi assumed office of India's Prime Minister in 2014, there was instability due to frequent changes in the leadership, ex-US President Donald Trump said in an podcast called 'Flagrant' with comedians Andrew Schultz and Akash Singh.
summary: Before Narendra Modi assumed office of India's Prime Minister in 2014, there was instability due to frequent changes in the leadership, ex-US President Donald Trump said in an podcast called 'Flagrant' with comedians Andrew Schultz and Akash Singh.

title: Weighing Response To Iran's Attack, Netanyahu's Phone Call With Biden
content: US President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris spoke Wednesday with Israeli leader Benjamin Netanyahu, the White House said, as Israel weighs its response to last week's missile attack by Iran.
summary: US President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris spoke Wednesday with Israeli leader Benjamin Netanyahu, the White House said, as Israel weighs its response to last week's missile attack by Iran.

title: Social Media Has Direct Impact On Mental Health: US Surgeon General To NDTV
content: There is a direct connection between social media use and mental health, especially among teenagers, the US Surgeon General Vice Admiral Vivek Murthy told NDTV today.
summary: There is a direct connection between social media use and mental health, especially among teenagers, the US Surgeon General Vice Admiral Vivek Murthy told NDTV today.

title: This Chinese "Spider-Woman" Can Climb 108-Metre Cliff Without Safety Gear
content: A 43-year-old woman in China is being praised online for her remarkable ability to climb cliffs exceeding 100 meters in height without safety gear.
summary: A 43-year-old woman in China is being praised online for her remarkable ability to climb cliffs exceeding 100 meters in height without safety gear.

title: China Boy Loses Finger After Father Takes Him To Foot Spa For Infection
content: A four-year-old boy in China had to have his finger amputated after his father took him to a foot massage parlour to treat a fungal infection in his nail.
summary: A four-year-old boy in China had to have his finger amputated after his father took him to a foot massage parlour to treat a fungal infection in his nail.

title: Hamas, Palestinian Rival Fatah Discuss Post-Gaza War Plans In Egypt
content: Leaders from Islamist group Hamas and Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas's Fatah movement discussed plans for cooperation after the war in Gaza in a new round of talks in Cairo on Wednesday, a Hamas official told Reuters.
summary: Leaders from Islamist group Hamas and Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas's Fatah movement discussed plans for cooperation after the war in Gaza in a new round of talks in Cairo on Wednesday, a Hamas official told Reuters.

title: China Comic Artists Expose Harsh Working Conditions At Famed Manga Studio
content: Former employees at one of China's best-known comic studios recently exposed the harsh working conditions at the workplace, where they have lived together in a "farm-like" flat for years, facing overwork and sleep deprivation.
summary: Former employees at one of China's best-known comic studios recently exposed the harsh working conditions at the workplace, where they have lived together in a "farm-like" flat for years, facing overwork and sleep deprivation.

title: Opinion: US Election: What Exactly Would A Trump Or A Harris Mean For The World?
content: For both Trump and Harris, whose views on foreign policy are still inchoate beyond a broad continuation of incumbent Joe Biden's approach, a primary determinant of their outlook will be their policy towards China.
summary: For both Trump and Harris, whose views on foreign policy are still inchoate beyond a broad continuation of incumbent Joe Biden's approach, a primary determinant of their outlook will be their policy towards China.

title: Turkish Airlines Pilot Dies Mid-Flight, Forcing Emergency Landing
content: A Turkish Airlines pilot died after collapsing mid-flight, forcing the Turkish national carrier to make an emergency landing in New York, the airline said on Wednesday.
summary: A Turkish Airlines pilot died after collapsing mid-flight, forcing the Turkish national carrier to make an emergency landing in New York, the airline said on Wednesday.

title: Malaysian Couple Praised Online For Gifting Their Domestic Helpers iPhones
content: A couple in Malaysia is being praised online for gifting Apple iPhones to their two domestic helpers.
summary: A couple in Malaysia is being praised online for gifting Apple iPhones to their two domestic helpers.

title: 6 Injured After Being Stabbed In "Terror Attack" In Israel
content: At least six people were wounded, two of them seriously, in a stabbing attack in the Israeli city of Hadera on Wednesday.
summary: At least six people were wounded, two of them seriously, in a stabbing attack in the Israeli city of Hadera on Wednesday.

title: Trump And Harris Fight For Pennsylvania County Known For Picking Presidents
content: With just four weeks before the November 5 presidential election, the battle for Erie County - a historically must-win county in a must-win state - demonstrates the urgency of identifying and contacting individual voters.
summary: With just four weeks before the November 5 presidential election, the battle for Erie County - a historically must-win county in a must-win state - demonstrates the urgency of identifying and contacting individual voters.

title: Ex-US Marine Sentenced To 14 Years By Russia For Fighting For Ukraine
content: Russia on Wednesday convicted in absentia a former US Marine who fought for Ukraine after spending over two years in a Russian prison before being released in a swap.
summary: Russia on Wednesday convicted in absentia a former US Marine who fought for Ukraine after spending over two years in a Russian prison before being released in a swap.

title: 3 Scientists Get Nobel Prize In Chemistry For Work On Protein Structures
content: Scientists David Baker, Demis Hassabis and John Jumper won the 2024 Nobel Prize in Chemistry, the award-giving body said on Wednesday.
summary: Scientists David Baker, Demis Hassabis and John Jumper won the 2024 Nobel Prize in Chemistry, the award-giving body said on Wednesday.

title: Did HBO Just Reveal Bitcoin Creator Satoshi Nakamoto's Real Identity?
content: Canadian developer Peter Todd is Satoshi Nakamoto, the mysterious creator of Bitcoin. No, we aren't saying it. It's award-winning filmmaker Cullen Hoback.
summary: Canadian developer Peter Todd is Satoshi Nakamoto, the mysterious creator of Bitcoin. No, we aren't saying it. It's award-winning filmmaker Cullen Hoback.

title: Antikythera: The Greece's Famed But Emptying Island
content: When the last national census was held in 2021, Antikythera had just 39 inhabitants, down from 120 in 2011.
summary: When the last national census was held in 2021, Antikythera had just 39 inhabitants, down from 120 in 2011.

title: Hurricane Milton To Bring Water Surge Of Up To 15 Feet To Tampa Bay

title: Boy Who Killed 10 Testifies At Parents' Trial, Many Leave Court In Tears
content: The 13-year-old boy carried out the killings on May 3 last year using his father's gun. He cannot be prosecuted due to his age but his parents face serious public safety charges.
summary: The 13-year-old boy carried out the killings on May 3 last year using his father's gun. He cannot be prosecuted due to his age but his parents face serious public safety charges.

title: Mexican Mayor Went Alone To Out Of Town Meeting Before His Beheading
content: The gruesome act happened just days before new President Claudia Sheinbaum unveiled her security strategy aimed at combating violent crime.

title: Meta, Challenging OpenAI, Announces New Sound-To-Video AI Model
content: The announcement comes as Hollywood has been wrestling with how to harness generative AI video technology this year, after Microsoft-backed OpenAI in February first showed off how its product Sora could create feature film-like videos.
summary: The announcement comes as Hollywood has been wrestling with how to harness generative AI video technology this year, after Microsoft-backed OpenAI in February first showed off how its product Sora could create feature film-like videos.
